major: Bachelor of Health Care, Nursing
description: Our top-notch clinical training center is designed to replicate real-world scenarios, allowing you to develop and practice your skills in a safe and supportive environment. With modern facilities, we take pride in offering an educational environment that supports an evolving field.

major: Bachelor of Beauty and Cosmetics, Beauty Care
description: A Bachelor of Beauty and Cosmetics has broad expertise in the beauty industry's topics such as makeup, style, hair and skin and can perform various tasks. Observe that Bachelor of Beauty and Cosmetics, Beauty Care does not work as a hairstylist or cosmetologist.

major: Bachelor of Health Care, Biomedical Laboratory Science
description: The Degree Programme Bachelor of Health Care, Biomedical Laboratory Science educates experts in clinical laboratory work. The studies are based on biomedical laboratory science supported with knowledge in biomedical sciences, and the work includes collecting specimens, performing diagnostic testing, as well as performing near-patient examinations in the presence of the patient.

major: Bachelor of Maritime Management, Maritime Management, Captain
description: The objective of the education is to train competent and versatile deck officers for the national, European and international traffic. The main tasks of a sea captain include being responsible for and maneuvering a vessel, and transporting cargo in such a way which is safe for both people and the environment.

major: Bachelor of Maritime Management, Maritime Management blended studies, Captain
description: The objective of the education is to train competent and versatile deck officers for the national, European and international traffic. The main tasks of a sea captain include being responsible for and maneuvering a vessel, and transporting cargo in such a way which is safe for both people and the environment.

major: Bachelor of Engineering, Maritime Technology
description: The objective of the education is to train competent and versatile deck officers for the national, European and international traffic. The main tasks of a sea captain include being responsible for and maneuvering a vessel, and transporting cargo in such a way which is safe for both people and the environment.

major: Bachelor of Engineering, Maritime Technology blended studies
description: The objective of the education is to train competent and versatile deck officers for the national, European and international traffic. The main tasks of a sea captain include being responsible for and maneuvering a vessel, and transporting cargo in such a way which is safe for both people and the environment.

major: Bachelor of Engineering, Information Technology
description: In today's world, IT technology is everywhere, both in small embedded devices and in fully digitized services in the cloud. Digitalization has simplified and made it easier to do our jobs. All these systems, and the need for new innovations, are created by programming and systems experts. The systems should work in mobile devices, in computers, and be accessible via the cloud. The systems must be secure, while at the same time being easy to use. To meet these needs, more IT engineers are needed.

major: Bachelor of Natural Resources, Sustainable Coastal Management
description: The degree programme in Sustainable Coastal Management, that is one of the few Bachelor Programmes in Europe focusing on Coastal issues, prepares students for working with issues that actually matters.

major: Bachelor of Culture and Arts, Fine Arts
description: The programme’s most important and primary objective is to enable the students to develop their own expression. Expression has no technical constraints. Your own ideas, visions, and individual ethics must always lead and guide your way. The teacher’s role is to act as a guide and tutor.

major: Master of Business Administration, Digital Business and Management
description: The Master’s degree programme answers the constantly growing competence requirements and needs in management, businesses and working life. The profile of the programme is on the combination of management skills, business and communication.

major: Master of Business Administration, MBA, Sustainable Business Design
description: The Master’s Degree Programme in Sustainable Business Design at Novia University of Applied Sciences is your gateway to making a significant impact in the world of business.

major: Master of Engineering, Industrial Management and Engineering
description: This programme equips you with insights and tools needed to capitalize on future business challenges. Additionally it equips you to create corporate financial value for shareholders and other constituencies linked to leadership, decision-making, artificial intelligence and analytics.

major: Master of Engineering, Intelligent Systems
description: Industrial automation is undergoing rapid development due to digitalization and technological improvements. As a student of the Masters degree programme in Intelligent Systems you will gain knowledge of how to model and simulate industrial processes, you will be able to identify opportunities for industrial decision-making and learn how to implement intelligent solutions.

major: Master of Engineering, Structural Engineering
description: This programme in Structural Engineering equips you with insights and tools needed to take a central role in creating sustainable and climate-smart buildings.

major: Master of Engineering/Master of Maritime Management
description: Maritime Management is a Master’s degree programme for sea captains and marine engineers who want to deepen their managerial expertise in international marine shipping. Students will be able to use the knowledge obtained for development, problem solving and innovation within maritime management.

major: Master of Engineering, Autonomous Maritime Operations
description: This Master's degree programme is for those who are interested in being a part of the fourth industrial revolution in maritime technology. The programme has a special focus concerning the digitalization of maritime operations. The target is to achieve state of the art competence and knowledge in the area of autonomous maritime operations.

major: Master of Natural Resources (online), Natural Resources Management
description: This Master’s degree programme is for those of you who wish to deepen your knowledge in sustainable management of natural resources. These studies have a special focus on bioeconomy, i.e., the use of renewable natural resources for producing food, energy, products, and services.

major: Master of Health Care/Master of Social Services, Health Care and Social Services
description: The programme provides leadership competence and expert knowledge for developing multi-professional social and health care settings and for meeting the demands of future work environments.

major: Master of Culture and Arts, Entrepreneurship In the Art, Music Production
description: The program is designed for active professionals in the global music industry who wish to further their career development in creative music production. During the ongoing Master's program, students have participated in meetings with major labels, streaming platforms, renowned studios, and key industry professionals.
